name: Milk Quest: Milk & Cookies
description:
It was a merry Christmas day, with lots and lots of joy.
In Mountainside Peaks, there was a fun-loving boy!
He had two friends, a milk fan and a spider.
And his parents were out, probably drinking cider.
Suddenly, in the mail, the milk fan gets a note.
It was from his landlord, and a businessman, he wrote:
"Come travel to my factory, I'm sure you will enjoy it!
I have a challenge for you that nobody has seen yet!"
And so, the three heroes travel through the snow.
They entered into his factory, to give this challenge a go.

  •  Wacky and downright stupid dialogue.
  • Three whole playable characters! Wow, that's more than real life!
  •  A unique challenging level!
  •  A small hub where you can talk to Santa himself!
  •  4 awards!
  •  A Soundtrack (Who could have guessed???)
  •  Fishing (NOTE: Not included due to legal reasons)

(This is not the full game, rather a special holiday demo.)

Project Credits:
